message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm confident we can reach a deal.
Let's try a bit more in my favor this time.
Let's be reasonable.  Since you didn't like my initial proposal, and I don't like yours, let's split it evenly this time. I'm willing to compromise.
I'm willing to take a bit more risk. This is my new offer.
I'm willing to go up a bit on your last offer, but not much more. Let's close this deal.  We are both losing money with each passing round.
